title: Roxy Jacenko is all-smiles as she jets out of Sydney in a $17K outfit amid the poo jogger drama
text:
She is currently embroiled in a poo jogger scandal, after a mystery woman was caught defecating twice near her offices in Sydney's Paddington.

But Roxy Jacenko proved that she couldn't give a crap about the drama anymore as she jetted out of Sydney airport on Wednesday.

The 39-year-old PR maven was all smiles as she wheeled her $14,000 luggage and accessories through the terminal.

She doesn't give a crap! Roxy Jacenko was all smiles as she jetted out of Sydney in a $17,000 designer outfit on Wednesday, amid the poo jogger drama

The blonde mother-of-two looked chic in black leather-look trousers with a black T-shirt and a $2,499 Balmain blazer.

She teamed the look with black and gold Chanel ballet flats, which retail for $990, and wore her long locks out and over her shoulders.

Roxy wheeled around a Goyard suitcase, estimated to cost a cool $10,300, and carried a Dior tote bag, which costs approximately $3,500.

Mucking around! Roxy appeared in high spirits as she made her way through the airport before jetting to Melbourne for work

Roxy appeared in high spirits as she made her way through the airport before jetting to Melbourne for work.

At one point, she had a laugh as she poked out her tongue.

It comes after her Sweaty Betty offices were targetted by a poo jogger, a mystery woman defecating twice near her building in Sydney's Paddington.

On Tuesday, Roxy shut down bizarre rumours the poo jogger may be KIIS FM radio host Jackie 'O' Henderson.

Flying attire: The blonde mother-of-two looked chic in black leather-look trousers with a black T-shirt and a $2,499 Balmain blazer

Awkward! On Tuesday, Roxy shut down bizarre rumours the poo jogger may be KIIS FM radio host Jackie 'O' Henderson

Roxy appeared on The Kyle and Jackie O Show and deleted the video of the incident from her Instagram page, saying she was outraged that Jackie was implicated in the scandal as she's a longtime friend.

'The only reason I took the videos down is because everyone kept saying it's Jackie O and I thought, "Oh, good grief, I better take it down for her".'

Jackie laughed off the false rumours, saying that she isn't as 'skinny' as the woman in the CCTV footage.

Outrageous! The 'Paddington pooper' saga began on Monday night, when Roxy shared shocking vision of the incident to her Instagram account

The 'Paddington pooper' saga began on Monday night, when Roxy shared shocking vision of the incident to her Instagram account.

She uploaded videos of the woman running behind a car, pulling down her pants and relieving herself on two separate occasions.

Furious with the young woman's behaviour, Roxy told Daily Mail Australia she has found faeces on the street for three weeks.

She said: 'It's disgusting, it's a lovely street lined with heritage terraces, kids playing and riding their bikes. Human faeces shouldn't be on any street. Something needs to be done.'

On Tuesday, Roxy confirmed that police are investigating the matter, saying: 'We have been sent info which will be passed to the police.'

Defecating in public is a type of offensive conduct in New South Wales and carries a maximum penalty of three months' imprisonment and/or a $660 fine.
description: She is currently embroiled in a poo jogger scandal, after a mystery woman was caught defecating twice near her offices in Sydney's Paddington.
authors: Chloe-Lee Longhetti For Daily Mail Australia
